newsitem.title: USA: Fed says 3-day fixed system RPs totaled $4.034 bln.
newsitem.headline: Fed says 3-day fixed system RPs totaled $4.034 bln.

text.p: The Federal Reserve added a total of $4.034 billion in temporary reserves to the banking system in its three-day fixed system repurchase operation on Monday, a New York Fed spokeswoman said.
That follows Friday's over-the-weekend system RPs which totaled $977 million.
